profile_summary:

My technical proficiency encompasses creating robust **RESTful APIs** and deploying applications in both Microsoft Windows Server and Linux environments, underpinned by a strong command of database management systems including **Oracle**, **MS SQL Server**, and **PostgreSQL**.

I bring a unique blend of problem-solving skills and technical expertise, exemplified through my hands-on experience in enterprise-grade platform development, microservices architecture, and integration of cloud services. Additionally, my background is enriched with effective communication skills and team collaboration, fostering adaptability to meet client needs and enhance engagement.

I am committed to delivering innovative solutions while providing effective presentations that resonate with stakeholders, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of our products and services.
